/* queryId : admin.message.selectMessageGridCount */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT BM.MessageID ,BM.FolderID ,BM.CategoryID ,BM.Subject ,BM.ExpiredDate ,BM.MsgState ,BM.RegistDate ,BM.DeleteDate ,BM.FileCnt ,BM.FileExtension ,BM.CreatorName ,BM.BodyText ,BM.RevisionDate FROM BOARD_MESSAGE BM INNER JOIN SYS_OBJECT_FOLDER SOF ON BM.FolderID = SOF.FolderID AND SOF.IsUse = 'Y' AND SOF.DeleteDate IS NULL
LEFT OUTER JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY BC ON BM.CategoryID = BC.CategoryID AND BC.FolderID = #{FolderID}
INNER JOIN BOARD_MESSAGE_REPORT BMR ON (BM.MessageID = BMR.MessageID) LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_OBJECT_USER SOU ON (SOF.RegisterCode = SOU.UserCode) INNER JOIN BOARD_MESSAGE_HISTORY BMH ON (BMR.HistoryID = BMH.HistoryID)
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(HistoryID) AS HistoryID, MessageID, MAX(RegistDate) AS RegistDate FROM BOARD_MESSAGE_HISTORY WHERE HistoryType ='Lock' GROUP BY MessageID ) LockHistory ON (BM.MessageID = LockHistory.MessageID)
AND (( BM.DeleteDate IS NOT NULL ) OR (BM.ExpiredDate < TO_DATE(#{localCurrentDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')))
INNER JOIN BOARD_REQUEST_MODIFY BRM ON (BM.MessageID = BRM.MessageID AND BRM.RequestStatus != 'Deleted')
WHERE 1=1
AND BM.MsgType NOT IN ('N', 'B')
AND BM.MsgType IN ('N', 'B') AND IsCurrent = 'Y'
AND BM.FolderID = #{folderID} AND BM.MsgType != 'S' AND BM.MsgState IN ('C', 'A', 'P')
AND BM.DeleteDate IS NOT NULL
AND BM.ExpiredDate < TO_DATE(#{localCurrentDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND (BM.MsgState = 'C' OR BM.MsgState = 'A') AND (BM.ExpiredDate IS NULL OR BM.ExpiredDate >= TO_DATE(#{localCurrentDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ) AND BM.DeleteDate IS NULL
AND BM.MsgState = #{msgState} AND BM.DeleteDate IS NULL
AND BM.FolderID = #{folderID}
AND (SOF.DomainID=#{domainID} OR BM.FolderID IN ( SELECT LinkFolderID FROM SYS_OBJECT_FOLDER WHERE DomainID = #{domainID} AND FolderType = 'ShareBoard' AND LinkFolderID IS NOT NULL ) )
AND BM.DeleteDate IS NULL AND (BM.MsgType IN ('O', 'C', 'M'))
AND BM.DeleteDate IS NULL AND (BM.MsgState IN ('P'))
AND (BM.ExpiredDate IS NOT NULL OR BM.ExpiredDate < TO_DATE(#{localCurrentDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') )
AND (C.MemberOf = #{categoryID} OR C.CategoryID = #{categoryID})
AND BM.CategoryID = #{categoryID}
) RESULT WHERE 1=1
AND
CreatorName BodyText Subject
LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
AND RegistDate between TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

,RESULT.ReportID AS "ReportID" ,RESULT.ReportUserCode AS "ReportUserCode" ,RESULT.ReportUserName AS "ReportUserName" ,RESULT.ReportDate AS "ReportDate" ,RESULT.ReportComment AS "ReportComment"
,RESULT.LockDate AS "LockDate"

FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum ,BM.MessageID ,BM.FolderID ,BM.Version ,SOF.DisplayName AS FolderName ,BM.CategoryID ,BM.Subject ,TO_CHAR(BM.ExpiredDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ExpiredDate ,BM.MsgState ,CASE WHEN BM.DeleteDate IS NOT NULL THEN '삭제' WHEN BM.MsgState = 'C' THEN '등록' WHEN BM.MsgState = 'A' THEN '승인' WHEN BM.MsgState = 'D' THEN '거부' WHEN BM.MsgState = 'P' THEN '잠금' WHEN BM.MsgState = 'R' THEN '등록 요청' WHEN BM.MsgState = 'T' THEN '임시저장' END AS MsgStateDetail ,TO_CHAR(BM.RegistDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS RegistDate ,BM.DeleteDate ,BM.FileCnt ,BM.FileExtension ,BM.CreatorCode ,Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, BM.CreatorName) AS CreatorName ,BM.BodyText ,BM.Seq ,BM.Step ,BM.Depth ,BM.NUMBER_ ,BM.IsCheckOut ,BM.RegistDept ,BM.OwnerCode ,(SELECT FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, MultiDisplayName) FROM SYS_OBJECT_USER WHERE UserCode = BM.OwnerCode) AS OwnerName ,(SELECT FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S( #{lang}, MultiDisplayName) FROM SYS_OBJECT_GROUP WHERE groupcode = BM.RegistDept) AS RegistDeptName ,DECODE (BM.RevisionDate ,NULL, TO_CHAR(BM.RegistDate, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_CHAR(BM.RevisionDate, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS')) AS RevisionDate
,BMR.ReportID ,BMR.RegisterCode AS ReportUserCode ,(SELECT FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, MultiDisplayName) FROM SYS_OBJECT_USER WHERE UserCode = BMR.RegisterCode) AS ReportUserName ,BMR.RegistDate AS ReportDate ,BMH.COMMENT_ AS ReportComment
,BMH.RegistDate AS LockDate
,BRM.RequestID ,BRM.RequestMessage ,BRM.RequestorCode ,BRM.RequestorName ,BRM.RequestDate ,BRM.AnswererCode ,BRM.AnswererName ,BRM.AnswerContent ,BRM.AnswerDate ,BRM.RequestStatus
FROM BOARD_MESSAGE BM INNER JOIN SYS_OBJECT_FOLDER SOF ON (BM.FolderID = SOF.FolderID AND SOF.DeleteDate IS NULL)

INNER JOIN BOARD_MESSAGE_REPORT BMR ON (BM.MessageID = BMR.MessageID) INNER JOIN BOARD_MESSAGE_HISTORY BMH ON (BMR.HistoryID = BMH.HistoryID)
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(HistoryID) AS HistoryID, MessageID, MAX(RegistDate) AS RegistDate FROM BOARD_MESSAGE_HISTORY WHERE HistoryType ='Lock' GROUP BY MessageID ) BMH ON (BM.MessageID = BMH.MessageID)
INNER JOIN BOARD_REQUEST_MODIFY BRM ON (BM.MessageID = BRM.MessageID AND BRM.RequestStatus != 'Deleted')
WHERE 1=1

AND (BM.MsgState = 'C' OR BM.MsgState = 'A') AND (BM.ExpiredDate IS NULL OR BM.ExpiredDate >= TO_DATE(#{localCurrentDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ) AND BM.DeleteDate IS NULL
AND BM.MsgState = #{msgState} AND BM.DeleteDate IS NULL

AND (C.MemberOf = #{categoryID} OR C.CategoryID = #{categoryID})
